creator: Prats Designs
descriptionHtml:
How often is the case when we get on the web to learn but end up wasting too much time?

How many times on the internet we were seriously learning something but then a recommendation just drifts us into a rabbit hole?

Or the times when we were there to find wisdom from people we admire but end up in a meaningless spat.

Although the Internet contains gems of knowledge, it is built for engagement not learning.

Felt the same way? Not anymore!

Introducing **Askify** - A Highly curated space of learning from talented individuals.

**Features:**

***Ask Anything - Elon Musk, Steve Jobs, and 100+ leaders are your friends**
Ask Anything to Elon Musk, Steve Jobs, Kunal Shah, and 100+ other leaders from their interviews, videos, and talks. This is the world’s first Knowledge Search Engine. You have to try it to believe it.

***Shorts - Discover ideas that matter to you:**
Daily ****Handpicked curated shorts videos with key ideas from the world’s best. Help you save a ton of time and makes you stay productive and motivated.

***Collections - Get different ideas and perspectives on topics from multiple leaders:**
A handpicked collection of short videos from multiple leaders on a single topic/question will give you a diverse perspective on a topic, Because something that worked for someone may not work for you.

***Learning Paths -  The new informed and time-saving way to master something**
Embark on **an** entirely new way to mastering a specific need. Each checkpoint will contain a collection on the topic and the world's best will assist you to make that happen.

**Why use it?**

- Discover new credible ideas from the world’s best daily.
- Elon musk, Kunal Shah 100+ leaders now in your pocket.
- Learn from the best free from noise.
- Consume a daily dose of knowledge and watch yourself grow.
- Access Askify from anywhere and on any device, mobile or desktop.
- Askify contains no-ads and is free
descriptionShort: Get highly curated life long learning from Talented Individuals

title: Askify - Curated key ideas from Thought Leaders

Bihar, India

creator: Prats Designs
descriptionHtml:
How often is the case when we get on the web to learn but end up wasting too much time?

How many times on the internet we were seriously learning something but then a recommendation just drifts us into a rabbit hole?

Or the times when we were there to find wisdom from people we admire but end up in a meaningless spat.

Although the Internet contains gems of knowledge, it is built for engagement not learning.

Felt the same way? Not anymore!

Introducing **Askify** - Organise, Save and Take Note from the whole Web

**Features:**

***Notes / Video Notes:
Askify helps you take video notes from youtube. From one-click timestamp and screenshot to getting caption everything you wanted is here.

***Save anything you Like:
From Videos, threads, articles, and more you can save anything. The home page is a space just for you and all the things that fascinate you.

***Personal Knowledge Search
With our AI-powered all you have to do is ASK, gone are the days of keywords search just ask in form of questions or phrases and we will find the answers not only from articles but also from inside the videos.

***Smart Organisation
Of course, you can tag and create a folder but you don't need it. We automatically organize all your content in different tags and buckets and make it very easy for you to revisit it later

**Why use it?**

- Notes / Video Notes
- Save anything you Like
- Personal Knowledge Search
- Smart Organisation
- Access Askify from anywhere and on any device, mobile or desktop.
- Askify contains no-ads and is free
descriptionShort: Organise and Take Notes from Everywhere
